sections.heading: The Director of the Department of Central Management Services
sections.text:
of the State of
Illinois may enter into agreements with any city, village, incorporated
town, county or other political subdivision in this State to furnish
services and facilities of the Department to such city, village,
incorporated town, county or other political subdivision to assist in the
administration of its personnel program on merit principles.

sections.heading: Short title.
sections.text: This Act may be cited as the Local Personnel Program Assistance Act.
